columns.name: finding_account_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the finding.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the finding.

columns.name: exploit_available
columns.description: If a finding discovered in your environment has an exploit available. Valid values are: YES | NO.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the finding.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the finding. Valid values are: ACTIVE | SUPPRESSED | CLOSED.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the finding. Valid values are: NETWORK_REACHABILITY | PACKAGE_VULNERABILITY.

columns.name: first_observed_at
columns.description: The date and time that the finding was first observed.

columns.name: fix_available
columns.description: Details on whether a fix is available through a version update. Valid values are: YES | NO | PARTIAL.

columns.name: inspector_score
columns.description: The Amazon Inspector score given to the finding.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The ID of the resource.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The resource type supported by AWS.

columns.name: component_type
columns.description: The component type.

columns.name: component_id
columns.description: The component ID of the resource.

columns.name: ec2_instance_image_id
columns.description: The Amazon EC2 instance image ID.

columns.name: ec2_instance_subnet_id
columns.description: The Amazon EC2 instance subnet ID.

columns.name: ec2_instance_vpc_id
columns.description: The Amazon EC2 instance VPC ID.

columns.name: ecr_image_architecture
columns.description: The Amazon ECR image architecture.

columns.name: ecr_image_hash
columns.description: The Amazon ECR image hash.

columns.name: ecr_image_pushed_at
columns.description: The Amazon ECR image push date and time.

columns.name: ecr_image_registry
columns.description: The Amazon ECR registry.

columns.name: ecr_image_repository_name
columns.description: The name of the Amazon ECR repository.

columns.name: ecr_image_tags
columns.description: The tags attached to the Amazon ECR container image.

columns.name: lambda_function_execution_role_arn
columns.description: The AWS Lambda function execution role ARN.

columns.name: lambda_function_last_modified_at
columns.description: The AWS Lambda functions the date and time that a user last updated the configuration.

columns.name: lambda_function_layers
columns.description: The AWS Lambda function layer.

columns.name: lambda_function_name
columns.description: The AWS Lambda function name.

columns.name: lambda_function_runtime
columns.description: The AWS Lambda function runtime environment.

columns.name: network_protocol
columns.description: The ingress source addresse.

columns.name: related_vulnerabilitie
columns.description: The related vulnerabilitie.

columns.name: last_observed_at
columns.description: The date and time that the finding was last observed.

columns.name: remediation_recommendation_text
columns.description: The recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

columns.name: remediation_recommendation_url
columns.description: The URL address to the CVE remediation recommendations.

columns.name: severity
columns.description: The severity of the finding. Valid values are: INFORMATIONAL | LOW | MEDIUM | HIGH | CRITICAL | UNTRIAGED.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The date and time the finding was last updated at.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the vulnerability information.

columns.name: source_url
columns.description: A URL to the source of the vulnerability information.

columns.name: vendor_created_at
columns.description: The date and time that this vulnerability was first added to the vendorâ€™s database.

columns.name: vendor_severity
columns.description: The severity the vendor has given to this vulnerability type.

columns.name: vendor_updated_at
columns.description: The date and time the vendor last updated this vulnerability in their database.

columns.name: vulnerability_id
columns.description: The ID given to this vulnerability.

columns.name: exploitability_details
columns.description: The details of an exploit available for a finding discovered in your environment.

columns.name: inspector_score_details
columns.description: An object that contains details of the Amazon Inspector score.

columns.name: network_reachability_details
columns.description: An object that contains the details of a network reachability finding.

columns.name: package_vulnerability_details
columns.description: An object that contains the details of a package vulnerability finding.

columns.name: cvss
columns.description: An object that contains details about the CVSS score of a finding.

columns.name: reference_urls
columns.description: One or more URLs that contain details about this vulnerability type.

columns.name: related_vulnerabilities
columns.description: One or more vulnerabilities related to the one identified in this finding.

columns.name: vulnerable_package
columns.description: The package impacted by this vulnerability.

columns.name: vulnerable_packages
columns.description: The packages impacted by this vulnerability.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: Contains information on the resources involved in a finding.

columns.name: resource_tags
columns.description: Details on the resource tags used to filter findings.

columns.name: title
columns.description: The title of the finding.
